Docs.summary: Allows apps to manipulate photo and video assets managed by the Photos App, including iCloud photos.

remarks.para: The Photos namespace, introduced in iOS 8, allows application developers to manipulate photos and videos managed by the Photos app, including iCloud photos.
Capabilities of the Photos namespace include:

item.term: Fetching assets and collections of assets.
Editing assets, including support for reverting changes.
Acces to Photos-provided data such as the Moments hierarchy, high-framerate video captures, whether photos were captured with panorama or burst mode, etc..
